arabicText: يَا أَيُّهَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اسْتَعِينُوا بِالصَّبْرِ وَالصَّلَاةِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ مَعَ الصَّابِرِينَ
translationText: O you who have believed, seek help through patience and prayer. Indeed, Allah is with the patient.
So be patient with a beautiful patience.
And be patient, for your patience is not but through Allah.
And give good news to the patient.

arabicText: وَلَنَبْلُوَنَّكُمْ بِشَيْءٍ مِّنَ الْخَوْفِ وَالْجُوعِ ... وَبَشِّرِ الصَّابِرِينَ
translationText: We will certainly test you with something of fear and hunger... But give good news to the patient.

arabicText: وَاصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا أَصَابَكَ ۖ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ عَزْمِ الْأُمُورِ
translationText: Be patient over what befalls you. Indeed, that is of the matters requiring determination.

arabicText: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ آمَنُوا۟ وَتَوَاصَوْا۟ بِٱلصَّبْرِ
translationText: Then he became of those who believed and advised one another to patience.

arabicText: وَجَعَلْنَا مِنْهُمْ أَئِمَّةًۭ يَهْدُونَ بِأَمْرِنَا لَمَّا صَبَرُوا۟ ۖ وَكَانُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا يُوقِنُونَ
translationText: And We made from among them leaders guiding by Our command when they were patient and [when] they were certain of Our signs.

arabicText: فَصَبْرٌۭ جَمِيلٌۭ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ ٱلْمُسْتَعَانُ عَلَىٰ مَا تَصِفُونَ
translationText: So patience is most fitting. And Allah is the one sought for help against that which you describe.

arabicText: قَالَ إِنَّمَا أَشْكُو بَثِّى وَحُزْنِىٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَأَعْلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
translationText: He said, 'I only complain of my suffering and my grief to Allah, and I know from Allah that which you do not know.'

arabicText: وَلَمَّا رَءَآ أَيْدِيَهُمْ لَا تَصِلُ إِلَيْهِ نَكِرَهُمْ وَأَوْجَسَ مِنْهُمْ خِيفَةًۭ ۚ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمِ لُوطٍۢ
translationText: But when he saw their hands not reaching for it, he distrusted them and felt apprehension from them. They said, 'Fear not. We have been sent to the people of Lot.'

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُطِعِ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ وَٱلْمُنَـٰفِقِينَ ۗ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
translationText: O Prophet, fear Allah and do not obey the disbelievers and the hypocrites. Indeed, Allah is Ever-Knowing and Wise.
